name: Never Have I Ever
description: Classic mode that uncovers the wildest secrets of the players. Let’s see who’s the most experienced!

dares.title: Secret Party
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever been to a party I regretted the next morning."

dares.title: Petty Theft
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever stolen loose change from a store."

dares.title: Random Kiss
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever kissed a stranger on a dare."

dares.title: Broken Heart Exit
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever walked out of a relationship without explanation."

dares.title: Spontaneous Trip
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever bought a ticket to another city on a whim."

dares.title: School Fight
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever gotten into a school fight."

dares.title: Overslept Exam
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever slept through an important exam."

dares.title: Teacher Crush
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever had a crush on a teacher or professor."

dares.title: Drunken Tattoo
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever gotten a tattoo while drunk."

dares.title: Terminal Nap
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever woken up at the last stop on public transport."

dares.title: Office Romance
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever started an office romance."

dares.title: Wrong Ride
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever taken the wrong train or bus."

dares.title: Sleep-Talking
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever talked in my sleep in front of others."

dares.title: Mirror Striptease
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever danced a striptease in front of a mirror."

dares.title: Missed Flight
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever missed a flight."

dares.title: Fake Sick Day
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever taken sick leave when I wasn’t sick."

dares.title: Late-Night Ex Chat
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever texted my ex late at night."

dares.title: Skinny-Dipping
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever gone skinny-dipping."

dares.title: Drowned Phone
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever accidentally dropped my phone in water."

dares.title: Secret House Party
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever thrown a secret house party without my parents knowing."

dares.title: Skipped School Day
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever skipped an entire school day."

dares.title: Wrong Recipient
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever sent an intimate message to the wrong person."

dares.title: Cringe Video
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever filmed a cringey video for social media."

dares.title: Spy Account
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever created a fake profile to spy on someone."

dares.title: Midnight Snack
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever eaten at night while standing in front of the fridge."

dares.title: Blind Date
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever gone on a blind date."

dares.title: Scared the Neighbors
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever scared my neighbors with strange noises."

dares.title: Big Gamble
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever lost a large sum of money gambling."

dares.title: Broke & Hid
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever broken someone’s belongings and kept quiet about it."

dares.title: Ran from Security
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever run from security or the police."

dares.title: Tag Showing
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever left the house with the price tag still on my clothes."

dares.title: Ate Insects
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever eaten insects."

dares.title: Slept at Work
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever fallen asleep at work or in a lecture."

dares.title: Hidden Tattoo
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever hidden a tattoo from my parents."

dares.title: Weird Fetish
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever had a strange attraction to objects."

dares.title: Accidental Like
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever accidentally liked my ex’s photo."

dares.title: Revenge on Ex
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever gotten revenge on an ex-partner."

dares.title: Childhood Escape
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever tried to run away from home as a kid."

dares.title: Fake Illness
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever pretended to be sick to cancel plans."

dares.title: Teacher Crush 2.0
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever fallen in love with my teacher."

dares.title: Eavesdropper
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever deliberately eavesdropped on someone’s conversation."

dares.title: Wrong Car
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever gotten into the wrong car by mistake."

dares.title: Fare Dodger
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever ridden public transport without paying."

dares.title: Heartbreaker
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever intentionally broken someone’s heart."

dares.title: Test Escape
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever skipped a test."

dares.title: Hotel Souvenirs
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever taken things from a hotel room."

dares.title: Woke Up Elsewhere
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever woken up in a stranger’s place with no idea how I got there."

dares.title: Selfie While Driving
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever taken a selfie while driving."

dares.title: Night-Time Fast-Food
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever eaten fast food at night while on a diet."

dares.title: Fake Age
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever lied about my age."

dares.title: Movie Sneak-In
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever snuck into a movie theater without a ticket."

dares.title: Stage Fright Fail
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever forgotten my lines on stage."

dares.title: Fake Skill
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever bragged about a skill I don’t actually have."

dares.title: Stole Roommate’s Food
dares.action: ${c_player}, say: "Never have I ever stolen food from a roommate’s fridge."

dares.title: Secret Alias
dares.action: I have never created an account under someone else’s name.

dares.title: Wings to Nowhere
dares.action: I have never left for another city without money or a plan.

dares.title: Dawn Call
dares.action: I have never called an ex at dawn.

dares.title: Fake Tattoo Bluff
dares.action: I have never claimed a temporary tattoo was real.

dares.title: Dare Dodge
dares.action: I have never backed out of a dare and then disappeared.

dares.title: Spilled a Secret
dares.action: I have never revealed someone’s secret after promising to keep it.

dares.title: Epic Public Fall
dares.action: I have never fallen in public and pretended it was a dance move.

dares.title: Forged a Signature
dares.action: I have never forged my parents’ signature.

dares.title: Celebrity DM
dares.action: I have never slid into a celebrity’s DMs.

dares.title: Mystery Tickets
dares.action: I have never bought concert tickets without knowing the performer.
